node.excerpt: Blank Space, inspired off of The Thoughts Room by The Quiet Place Project (now down), represents a space to type away worries and watch them fade away. Not only was this a fun project to practice JavaScript animation effects but it also served as a…

I wanted to figure the inner workings of networks so I experimented with creating a local chatroom. Using the server-side app, you can host a server for people to chat on. Using the client-side app, you can join a server and chat with those on it. It…

The classic Pac-Man game written in Java. Featuring a fancy start screen, new power-ups, status pane, player name, and sound effects. This was one of my first programming projects where I probably spent way too long adding new features here and there…

This site is created by Gatsby.js, a static site generator. Building off of HTML5 UP's template, I am able to create a blazing fast site to showcase my portfolio and notes. The portfolio files are written in Markdown and queried using GraphQL.

Project Euler is an archive of interesting mathematical problems that can solved through programming languages. Project Euler isn't focused on the language used but rather the technique and problem solving necessary to come up with the right answer…
